about_the_game:
Kiki tells the exciting tale of a child, Kiki, who embarks on a thrilling adventure to find her mother and uncover the truth in her magical and supernatural world. In this unique action-adventure game, you'll struggle to save the village under Nere's guidance in a fantastical realm.

Discover the Enchanted World: Explore a fantastical world brimming with surprises at every turn, offering diversity in seasons and geographical features. From lush greenery to desolate deserts, from stormy weather to the depths of gloomy forests, thrilling adventures await you everywhere.

Kiki's Story: Take control of Kiki's character and become a part of her story. Experience the emotional journey of Kiki, a brave and determined character grappling with familial issues, and grow alongside her.

Diverse Opportunities: Engage in battles with warriors, combat creatures, complete missions, or simply explore the world. Develop new skills with Kiki to confront any challenge and dive into the adventure.

Multiple Endings: Tough decisions and tasks you encounter can lead to different endings, shaping the fate of the village. Make choices that will define the outcome and witness the consequences. Each decision you make will influence the progression of the game.

Importance of Relationships: Interact with villagers and strengthen your relationships. Meet their demands, earn their support, and enhance your character's abilities. However, be cautious, as a wrong decision could damage relationships and jeopardize your future.

Epic Battles and Thrilling Adventures: Explore monster-filled forests, investigate magical realms, and engage in epic battles to end the curse threatening your village. Under Kiki's leadership, embark on unforgettable adventures and triumphantly crown your village with victory!

name: Kiki
short_description: Kiki, is a single player story driven action adventure game with survival elements where you will control Kiki as she goes into a journey to save her village from years of curse in a fantastic world.
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Ukrainian, Swedish
